    and a host of others.


    https://www.noblelifeelements.com/wormeesherbs

    That link is to our website where we sell/distribute our superfoods!

    It's been an amazing opportunity so far, and I only see it getting better!

    If you'd like to learn more please check out the link!
no computer for at least a couple weeks.. laaame ass

I have the most beauitful girl sleeping right next to where i am sitting... and i love her. i didnt know it was possiable to some and care about someone this much... but i do.. and she's all mine.. hehe and im all hers... and i still find myself amazed... amazed by everything about her... and that shes mine.. heheh yay! i gotta go snuggle my sleepy lisa. hehehehehe

so i will be transfering to the walmart in tuscon jan.12  and my moving date will be the 5th... i should have a good 1200 to take with me when i go... annd the move in price is 509... so yeah... ill have a bunch extra money... i think imma see if j will build me a cpu

how how bout it for mood swings huh... things are looking insanely insanely promising for me right now.. i have a beauitful amazing girl sleeping in the very same room as me and shes as madly fallen and in love with me as i am with here... but yet i still cant rid myself of the lurking sorrow that resides (what seems like forever) inside me...  i hate it that i can still feel this way with all the greatness and good going on right now for me.. i mean... i think i have seriously found the ONE person i want to be with for the rest of my life.. no motha fuckin joke...  

kill stupid bad feelings..

oh.. im going back to lauras around 7/8 i wont see lisa for 5 days... it makes my heart hurt... litterially.  i need to lay down  this is not a kewl feeling.

rip new orleans dont think youll make it this time.

posted via wmlj

So we were in nola a total of 4 days... worst fuckin four days of my life.  The day we got there we had taken a bus because we got stopped by a cop in nasheville. luckily jeskas mom was able to order us the ticket.  So we got to nola at like 5 in the morning.. and we see this guy sitting out front of the station that looks like a traveling/squatter kid.  A few minutes after sitting down he comes over and asks to say hi to karma. I say yep and he plays with karma for like an hour.. then he offers me a mickeys 24oz and we show off our tattoos.  After sitting with him for like 3 hours we walk to the libary.. and we sleep out front of there until it opens... oh!! the best part.. on our walk to the libary it starts to poooour down rain.  lucky us we maded it to nola just intime for a catagory 2 tropical storm.  so from the libary we walked to a puppy park that we remembered had shelter from rain.  plus karma was aloud to run around off the leash there.  the next day we go to the drop in, get bins for our excess shit so we're not walking around like turtles with huge packs/shells on our backs.  that helped... blah.. i dont even rember what else we did that day.. no one was in town... the weather was 90+ degrees and raining.... it blew... we slept like 10 hours over the span of 4 days.  we slept in parks and parking lots. we're in baton rouge now we are trying to get out of here tomorrow... sleeping in a park tonight.. its fuckin 95 degrees out.

so we got to aheville today at 10am.. we havent slept since 2 nights ago... this blows.  We know where nothing is here.. jeska was here a while ago but doesnt remember much.  there's a FNBs here right?  is there a drop in or anything...?  all we've seen so far are a lot of fuckin homebums.  where the traveling kids at?  anyone reading this and in asheville keep an eye out for two kids with a little blue heeler puppy and a black pack and a green pack.  let us know whats up.. this town is mall but confusing.  we should have went to nola.

So i cant sign into my aim anymore under chessxcore. it says the password is wrong.. and its NOT. so if you want me to keep in touch with you reply to this with your aim name because i lost everyones. DEAD!

oh, my new aim name is karmakillscops

drama drama drama... so i went home after being at the computer and kari was there with her entire family and tom moving all of her shit out. if that's the kinda bullshit kari wants to pull.. let her pull it.. i don't give a fuck.  she's discusting.. everything about her makes me litterially sick to my stomach... from her gross neglect of her animals to her over all stink and filth and laziness in regards to everything... its gotta be nice having everything handed to you... your car... $14,000.  everything.. your whole life. It gotta feel good not having to worry about shit... like where your going to sleep in the coming month... if your going to even be alive then.  its got to feel real fuckin cozy borrowing hundreds from your momma to just go out to eat... or buy an ounce of pot.  never to have to worry about anything.  there's a difference between venting and talking about stepping out on a year commitment and actually doing it.  It's safe to say you ruined what little good i had going for me.  What will i do now... i guess you could give a fuck about that.  5 years destroyed.  i wouldnt piss on you if you were on fire.
Everything we've ever done together is nothing.  You are the lowliest piece of shit ive ever met.... and ive met a looot of pieces of shit.   Fuck you. die.

Who's Your Anime Girlfriend?

Animal Rescue League Request

Hi, all you animal lovers. This seems pretty simple. The Animal Rescue Site is having trouble getting enough people to click on it daily to meet their quota of getting free food donated every day to abused and neglected animals.

It takes less than a minute to go to their site and click on "feed an animal in need" for free. This doesn't cost you a thing. Their corporate sponsors/advertisers use the number of daily visits to donate food to abandoned/neglected animals in exchange for advertising.

Here's the web site! Pass it along to people you know.

http://www.theanimalrescuesite.com

AGAIN, PLEASE pass this on to other pet owners!
Thank you and good blessings to you and the
four legged ones in your life!

"Surely there will be some nonhuman animals whose lives, by any standards, are more valuable than the lives of some humans."

-Peter Singer


Regan when asked which he would save, a dog or a baby, if a boat capsized in the ocean: "If it were a retarded baby and a bright dog, I'd save the dog."

-Tom Regan 


"The life of an ant and that of my child should be granted equal consideration."

-Michael W. Fox

from 11/8/2001


Have you ever had a friend that you thought you knew inside and out... that when you were with that person, you could talk openly and freely... you could share your saddest along with the happiest memories with one another... and the other person just understood... and you KNEW they understood... i had a friend like that... a friend that when she said "i love you timmy" i believed it...and when i said it back i meant it... i really, with all my heart meant it... I grew slowly apart from this friend... we went from hanging out almost everyday after school... sitting on the trampaline just looking into each others eyes... talking about what sorrows filled our hearts... we would be so deep in our conversation that we paid absolutely no attention to our surroundings... it was raining on us and we didn't even notice until after hours of talking our eyes left one anothers... now i barely talking once a week on the phone with her.. and when we do talk it's about stupid stuff... is this how all good friendships end? 

Little would i know she died a little over a year after i wrote this...

The dark violet surroundings
the never ending void of blackness

laying on my back in the soft grass

looking up into the endless night sky

I breathe the chilling air, and I can conceive 

how utterly alone We all really are

As I lie within the embrace of the stars, I silently weep.

Why must these thoughts come to one so young?

Why can I comprehend what others cannot fathom?

Does anyone truly know?

Am I forever alone?

just random thoughts i had while reflecting on Romanticism Philosophy... 




It was once said that the duty of a Romantic was to; experience life or dream himself away from it.


I myself do not think this applies to only the Romantics. It applies to everyone. 


Those who experience life are those who suffer tremendously. For they are the ones who not only see and hear their surrounding... they feel them. Their soul is tortured with these feelings that turn to thoughts, that reflect on feelings. 


In the other column there are those who dream themselves away from life. I personally think that the majority of the people in the world are dreamers. Furthermore I think that if you can say you are honestly happy... then you are a dreamer. Their is nothing wrong with these people.. in a way i envy them. Their minds aren't plagued with truths.

I got to san Francisco a few days ago now... i like it here more than any other place we've been to on the west coast so far.  Jessicas birthdays soon!  Her familys going to be sending some money and im going to be doing some Medical reasearch thing so thats some money we have to get out of here... we hopefully will get to Chicago by mid- September.  I think we are going to work for a while after that.. get jessica a passport and the go to Europe.  So yeah... i think im going to just make and keep up this journal name.. i have a name for free opem diary.. but that site sucks pretty bad.  It's hard to not keep that one though i have like 300 + entries.  I think ill bring some of those ones to this one and then just delete that one.  Alright, well we gotta get to the drop-in in about 10 minutes...
